statements: SELECT * FROM inventory_reports WHERE report_id = 1;
SELECT report_name, inventory_level FROM inventory_reports WHERE inventory_level > 100 ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT report_name, sales_trend FROM inventory_reports WHERE sales_trend < 0.0 ORDER BY report_name ASC;
SELECT report_id, report_name, report_date FROM inventory_reports WHERE inventory_level IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM inventory_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM inventory_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC, report_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT report_id, report_name, inventory_level FROM inventory_reports WHERE sales_trend > 0.5;
SELECT report_name, report_date, inventory_level FROM inventory_reports WHERE inventory_level < 100 ORDER BY report_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM inventory_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT report_name, inventory_level, sales_trend FROM inventory_reports WHERE report_name LIKE '%Monthly%' AND sales_trend < 0.5 ORDER BY inventory_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_reports;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory_reports WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT id, product_name, last_updated FROM inventory_reports ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT sales_amount, sales_date FROM sales_trends WHERE sales_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sales_amount DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity, last_updated FROM inventory_reports WHERE product_name LIKE 'P%' AND quantity < 50;
SELECT * FROM inventory_reports WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT product_name, SUM(quantity) as total_quantity FROM inventory_reports GROUP BY product_name;
SELECT product_name, COUNT(*) as total_sales FROM sales_trends WHERE sales_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' GROUP BY product_name HAVING total_sales > 5;
SELECT product_name, AVG(sales_amount) as avg_sales FROM sales_trends GROUP BY product_name ORDER BY avg_sales DESC;
SELECT sales_date, SUM(sales_amount) as total_sales FROM sales_trends GROUP BY sales_date ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE item_id = 1;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM Inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, sale_amount FROM Sales WHERE sale_amount > 100;
SELECT report_type, report_data FROM Reports;
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE item_id = 3;
SELECT sale_id, sale_amount, sale_date FROM Sales WHERE sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT report_type, report_data FROM Reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Inventory JOIN Sales ON Inventory.item_id = Sales.item_id WHERE Inventory.quantity >= 5 AND Sales.sale_amount < 5000;
SELECT * FROM inventory_reports;
SELECT product_name, inventory_level, report_date FROM inventory_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT report_id, product_name, inventory_level FROM inventory_reports WHERE inventory_level > 100;
SELECT * FROM sales_reports WHERE revenue > 5000;
SELECT trend_id, trend_date, revenue, trend_description FROM sales_trends ORDER BY trend_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC, inventory_level ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, inventory_level FROM inventory_reports WHERE product_name LIKE 'P%' AND inventory_level > 100 ORDER BY inventory_level DESC;
SELECT product_name, units_sold, revenue FROM sales_reports WHERE revenue > 1000 AND units_sold BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT trend_date, revenue, trend_description FROM sales_trends WHERE trend_date >= '2021-01-01' AND trend_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY trend_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, inventory_change, trend_description FROM inventory_trends WHERE inventory_change < 0 ORDER BY inventory_change ASC, trend_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Inventory ORDER BY ProductName ASC;
SELECT ProductID, ProductName, Quantity FROM Inventory WHERE Quantity > 10;
SELECT ProductName, Price FROM Inventory WHERE Price < 50 ORDER BY Price DESC;
SELECT * FROM Sales WHERE SaleDate BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT CustomerName, Email FROM Customers WHERE Phone LIKE '%555%';
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE Quantity > 100 ORDER BY ProductName DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT ProductName, Price FROM Inventory WHERE Price >= 50.00 AND Quantity < 50;
SELECT ProductName, Quantity, Price FROM Inventory WHERE Price BETWEEN 20.00 AND 100.00 ORDER BY Quantity ASC;
SELECT CustomerName, Email FROM Customers WHERE Phone LIKE '%123%' OR Email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM Sales INNER JOIN Inventory ON Sales.ProductID = Inventory.ProductID WHERE SaleAmount > 1000 ORDER BY SaleDate ASC;
